Interface IScrapeEngine<T>

A IScrapeEngine<T> encapsulates the management of multiple IScrapeJob and traversal over the resultant tree to produce a single object of type .

Namespace: Snowflake.Scraping
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IScrapeEngine<T>
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The resultant of this IScrapeEngine<T>

Methods

CreateJob(IEnumerable<SeedTree>, IEnumerable<IScraper>, IEnumerable<ICuller>)

Creates a job and returns its GUID in the engine. A reference to the created job is held until the result is produced.

Declaration
Guid CreateJob(IEnumerable<SeedTree> initialSeeds, IEnumerable<IScraper> scrapers, IEnumerable<ICuller> cullers)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<SeedTree> initialSeeds

ANy initial seeds to begin with this job.
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<IScraper> scrapers

The list of scrapers to use wtih this job.
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<ICuller> cullers

The list of cullers to use with this job
Returns
Type Description
System.Guid

The GUID of the job.

Removes the given seeds, then culls the seeds of a ScrapeJob.

Result(Guid)

Continues with the job until it is completed, return the result. and remove the job from the queue.

Declaration

Parameters
